divs: Sighting DetailsMy sister, her boyfriend, and myself witnessed a orange glowing object that was moving quickly and then stop on a dime and ascend into the clouds out of sight just before it came back down into viewing distance. I am seeing that many of you are experiances the same phenomenon and would love to hear your personal story. This may be a strange coincident or something is really happening. I have never believed in UFO's until last night. I an confirm this object was neither a plane or helicopter.
Summary: UFO Sighting- Orange Glowing Object July 4th, 2012
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Forest Lake
There was one other sighting in Forest Lake on or around July 4th 2012
